featured.text: They are often given a checklist that provides directions on what to observe or look out for to ensure consistency.
This was to ensure that no single and powerful noble family could seize the title and pass it to the next generation.
She will ensure it doesn’t happen again.
They ensured the meat would not twist while being cut.
It is essential for us to maintain constant _____ with our friends to ensure that we have someone to talk to in times of need.

other.text: To reduce the weight and ensure the safety.

definition.zh_def: 確保，保證某事發生或某事的真實性。
definition.en_def: To make certain that something will happen or be the case.
definition.example: Please ensure that the door is locked before you leave.
